sqlMap.select: SELECT folderid as folderId, title as title, name as name, description as description, descriptionlng1 as descriptionLng1, descriptionlng2 as descriptionLng2, parent as parent, changeddate as changedDate, mediacount as mediaCount, mediacounts as mediaCountS, icon as icon, titlelng1 as titleLng1, titlelng2 as titleLng2, sortby as sortBy, orderby as orderBy, defaultview as defaultview, createdate as createDate, primaryivid as primaryIvid, folderdate as folderDate, creatoruserid as creatorUserId, fid as fid, public as publicAcl, inheritacl as inheritAcl, protected as protectedAcl FROM folder WHERE folderid = #value#

SELECT folderid as folderId, title as title, name as name, description as description, descriptionlng1 as descriptionLng1, descriptionlng2 as descriptionLng2, parent as parent, changeddate as changedDate, mediacount as mediaCount, mediacounts as mediaCountS, icon as icon, titlelng1 as titleLng1, titlelng2 as titleLng2, descriptionlng1 as descriptionLng1, descriptionlng2 as descriptionLng2, sortby as sortBy, orderby as orderBy, defaultview as defaultview, createdate as createDate, primaryivid as primaryIvid, folderdate as folderDate, creatoruserid as creatorUserId, fid as fid, public as publicAcl, inheritacl as inheritAcl, protected as protectedAcl FROM folder WHERE name = #value#
sqlMap.statement:
SELECT folder.folderid, title, name, description, descriptionlng1, descriptionlng2, parent, changeddate, mediacount, mediacounts, icon, sortby, orderby, defaultview, titlelng1, titlelng2, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage, createdate as createDate, primaryivid as primaryIvid, folderdate as folderDate, creatoruserid as creatorUserId, fid as fid, public, inheritacl, protected FROM folder WHERE parent = #id#
ORDER BY name, title DESC
ORDER BY title DESC
ORDER BY createdate DESC
ORDER BY folderdate DESC

SELECT folderid, title, name, description, descriptionlng1, descriptionlng2, parent, changeddate, mediacount, mediacounts, icon, sortby, orderby, defaultview, titlelng1, titlelng2 , '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage, createdate as createDate, primaryivid as primaryIvid, folderdate as folderDate, creatoruserid as creatorUserId, fid as fid, public, inheritacl, protected FROM folder ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT folder.folderid, title, name, description, descriptionlng1, descriptionlng2, parent, changeddate, count(folderholder.ivid) as mediacount, mediacounts, icon, sortby, orderby, defaultview, titlelng1, titlelng2 , '0' as usedLanguage, createdate as createDate, primaryivid as primaryIvid, folderdate as folderDate, creatoruserid as creatorUserId, fid as fid, public, inheritacl, protected FROM folderholder RIGHT OUTER JOIN folder ON folderholder.folderid = folder.folderid GROUP BY folder.folderid ORDER BY title DESC

SELECT folder.folderid, title, name, description, descriptionlng1, descriptionlng2, parent, changeddate, mediacount, mediacounts, icon, sortby, orderby, defaultview, titlelng1, titlelng2 , '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage, createdate as createDate, primaryivid as primaryIvid, folderdate as folderDate, creatoruserid as creatorUserId, fid as fid, public, inheritacl, protected FROM folder LEFT OUTER JOIN folderholder ON folder.folderid = folderholder.folderid WHERE folderholder.ivid = #id# GROUP BY folder.folderid ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT DISTINCT folder.folderid, folder.title, folder.name, folder.description, folder.descriptionlng1, folder.descriptionlng2, folder.parent, folder.changeddate, folder.mediacount, folder.mediacounts, folder.icon, folder.sortby, folder.orderby, folder.defaultview, folder.titlelng1, folder.titlelng2 , '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage, folder.createdate as createDate, folder.primaryivid as primaryIvid, folder.folderdate as folderDate, folder.creatoruserid as creatorUserId, folder.fid as fid, folder.public as public, folder.inheritacl as inheritacl, folder.protected as protected FROM folder LEFT OUTER JOIN folder as p ON p.folderid = folder.parent WHERE folder.parent = #id# OR p.parent = #id#
ORDER BY folder.name, folder.titlelng1 ASC
ORDER BY folder.titlelng1 ASC
ORDER BY createdate DESC
ORDER BY folderdate DESC
ORDER BY folder.name, folder.titlelng2 ASC
ORDER BY folder.titlelng2 ASC
ORDER BY createdate DESC
ORDER BY folderdate DESC
